text: Kahaini is a settlement in located in Muranga County which is a part of Kenya's Central Province. Kahaini is approximately 62 km/32 mi northeast of Nairobi, Kenya's capital. In December 2018, Brush Manufacturers, announced it's plans to relocate from Nairobi to Kahaini citing lack of expansion space in Nairobi. Brush Manufacturers acquired 100-acres of land to construct it's new facility, which will be located in the future Kandara Business Park. == References == Category:Populated places in Central Province (Kenya)
title: Kahaini
